titleStmt.title: Relation of the procession, fasting and penance, enjoyn'd by Mahomet-Solyman Emperour of the Turks. From the rising to the seting of the sun, lord of lords, and rightful sucessor of the race of the great prophet Mahomet, to be observed through the whole Ottoman Empire.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Holy-Rood-House, and are to be sold by James Mein ...,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
